mapper.select: select P.*,M.MEMBERID,M.MEMBERNAME,M.MEMBERPHONE,ME.MENUNAME from pay P JOIN MEMBER M ON(P.MEMBERNUM = M.MEMBERNUM) JOIN MENU ME ON(ME.MENUCODE = P.MENUCODE) order by paynum desc

select P.PAYNUM,P.BUSINESSCODE,to_char(P.PAYDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') as PAYDATE,P.MENUCODE,P.PRICE,P.COUNT,P.MEMBERNUM,P.PAYORDERMETHOD,P.PAYREQUEST,P.PAYORDERNUM,M.MEMBERID,M.MEMBERNAME,M.MEMBERPHONE,ME.MENUNAME from pay P JOIN MEMBER M ON(P.MEMBERNUM = M.MEMBERNUM) JOIN MENU ME ON(ME.MENUCODE = P.MENUCODE) WHERE P.PAYORDERNUM = #{payOrderNum}

select p.*,M.MEMBERID,M.MEMBERNAME,M.MEMBERPHONE,ME.MENUNAME from(select row_number() over(partition by payorderNum order by payorderNum) as rnum,payordernum,paynum,businesscode,paydate,menucode,count,membernum,payordermethod,payrequest,price from pay) p JOIN MEMBER M ON(P.MEMBERNUM = M.MEMBERNUM) JOIN MENU ME ON(ME.MENUCODE = P.MENUCODE) where rnum = 1 and p.businesscode = 12 order by payordernum desc

select count(*) from(select row_number() over(partition by payorderNum order by payorderNum) as rnum,payordernum,paynum,businesscode,paydate,menucode,count,membernum,payordermethod,payrequest from pay) p JOIN MEMBER M ON(P.MEMBERNUM = M.MEMBERNUM) JOIN MENU ME ON(ME.MENUCODE = P.MENUCODE) where rnum = 1 and p.businesscode = 12

select count(*) as todayOrderCount from(select row_number() over(partition by payorderNum order by payorderNum) as rnum,payordernum,paynum,businesscode,paydate,menucode,count,membernum,payordermethod,payrequest from pay) p JOIN MEMBER M ON(P.MEMBERNUM = M.MEMBERNUM) JOIN MENU ME ON(ME.MENUCODE = P.MENUCODE) where rnum = 1 and p.businesscode = 12 and TO_CHAR(paydate, 'YY/MM/DD') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YY/MM/DD')

select count(*) as todayOrderCount from(select row_number() over(partition by payorderNum order by payorderNum) as rnum,payordernum,paynum,businesscode,paydate,menucode,count,membernum,payordermethod,payrequest from pay) p JOIN MEMBER M ON(P.MEMBERNUM = M.MEMBERNUM) JOIN MENU ME ON(ME.MENUCODE = P.MENUCODE) where rnum = 1 and p.businesscode = #{businessCode} and TO_CHAR(paydate, 'YY/MM/DD') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YY/MM/DD')
